info.title: OBSOLIO API Documentation
info.description:
# OBSOLIO API - Organized Endpoint Structure

This API provides a clear separation between different user contexts:

## Endpoint Organization

### Public Endpoints
- `/auth/*` - Authentication and registration
- `/marketplace/*` - Public marketplace for browsing agents
- `/subscription-plans` - Pricing information

### Admin Endpoints (System Console)
- `/admin/*` - System administration operations
  - Tenant management
  - User management
  - Agent management (global)
  - Analytics and reports
  - Audit logs

### Tenant Endpoints (Dashboard)
- `/tenant/*` - Tenant-specific operations
  - Profile and settings
  - Dashboard and statistics
  - Organizations
  - Agents (installed)
  - Subscriptions and billing
  - Activities and sessions

### Webhooks
- `/webhooks/*` - External callback endpoints

## Authentication

Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:

```
Authorization: Bearer <your-jwt-token>
```

Public endpoints (auth, marketplace) do not require authentication.

get.description: Get all agent categories ordered by display_order with agents count

delete.description: Delete an agent category (only if no agents exist in category)

get.description: Get all agent endpoints with filters

post.description: Create a new agent endpoint (trigger or callback)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent endpoint
Get paginated list of all agent execution history with filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by agent name or run ID

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent execution run

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status: active, ended, expired

get.description: Get paginated list of all organizations with filters

post.description: Create a new organization for a tenant

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific organization

post.description: Deactivate an organization by deactivating its tenant
Reactivate a deactivated organization by reactivating its tenant

get.description: Get statistics about all organizations
Get paginated list of all subscription instances with filters

post.description: Create a new subscription for a tenant

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific subscription

immediately.description: Cancel immediately or at period end

get.description: Get statistics about all subscriptions

get.summary: List all tenants with filtering and pagination
get.description: Get a paginated list of all tenants with advanced filtering options

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or subdomain

get.summary: Get detailed information about a specific tenant

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive tenant statistics including counts by status, type, and plan
Get a paginated list of all users with filters

post.description: Create a new user with role assignment

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific user

delete.description: Delete a user (system admins cannot be deleted)

get.description: Get all subscription plans with optional filters

delete.description: Delete a subscription plan (only if no active subscriptions)

get.description: Get a paginated list of all agents with filters

post.description: Create a new agent in the system

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent (admin view)
Get overall platform statistics and metrics
Get revenue breakdown by period
Get agent statistics by category and top agents
Get paginated list of platform activity logs
Get paginated list of impersonation activity
Get all categories assigned to an agent

put.description: Replace all categories for an agent

post.description: Attach one or more categories to an agent (preserves existing)

delete.description: Detach one or more categories from an agent

patch.description: Alias for PUT - Replace all categories

Unauthorized.description: Unauthenticated - Invalid or missing JWT token

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer {token}
